name: Soren
long_description:
Soren is building the first autonomous QA engineer for AI systems.

Today, every model or prompt update risks introducing regressions, forcing teams to spend hundreds of hours maintaining evals and debugging failures.

Soren automates the entire evaluation process â€” dynamically updating tests, surfacing root causes, and running experiments to test fixes.

We replace manual triage with adaptive, AI-driven evals that help teams ship more reliable AI, faster.
one_liner: Autonomous QA engineer for AI systems
